706866f-a.title: Brooklyn: State Street - Smith Street
706866f-a.text:
(1)
State Street, north side, just west of Smith Street, showing the
rear of the Old County Court House.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing also the site for the new Central Courts Building,
subseduently erected, which has since 1931, housed the County, Municipal
and City Courts.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
706866f-a.folder: State Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY

706867f-a.title: Brooklyn: State Street - Smith Street
706867f-a.text:
State Street, west from Smith Street. In the fore-
ground are W. P. A. men working on a sewer project.
Marci 7, 1936
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE
706867f-a.folder: State Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY

706868f-b.title: Brooklyn: State Street - Smith Street
706868f-b.text:
(1)
State Street, at the N.w. corner of Smith Street, showing site for
the new Central Courts Building to be erected.
October 5, 1929.
L. Sperr.
NC REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same; showing the new Central Courts Building. This view of
its Smith Street side and its rear was taken from State Street.
April 13, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
706868f-b.folder: State Street & Smith Street, Brooklyn, NY

706869f-a.text:

706804f-a.title: Brooklyn: Smith Street - State Street
706804f-a.text:
Smith Street, east side, between State Street and Atlantic Ave., look-
ing eastward down the center of the block, showing the Willi msburg Savings
Bank in the background.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

706803f-a.text:
Smith Street, east side, north from State Street to Fulton Street, and
its B.M.T. Elevated Lines.
